articles.title: Kim Jong Il Greets Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Greets Syrian President
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a congratulatory message to Bashar Al-Assad, regional secretary of the Baath Arab Socialist Party and President of Syria, Friday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of Syria's independence.
					 The message says:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to you and the friendly people of Syria on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of its independence, a national holiday of the Syrian people.
					
					 Our people are sincerely rejoiced over the big progress made by the Syrian people in carrying out the cause of justice to defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation from every challenge of the hostile forces and build modern Syria after the independence.
					
					 I take this opportunity to heartily wish the Syrian people always success in their efforts to achieve prosperity of the country and solve the Mideast problem in a fair and comprehensive way and you good health and happiness.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Syrian President 
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a congratulatory message to Bashar Al-Assad, President of Syria, on Friday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of its independence.
					Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to develop in the future, too, Kim in the message sincerely wished the Syrian people greater success in their efforts to regain the occupied land and achieve the peace, security, development and modernization of the country under the correct leadership of the President.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets Syrian PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets Syrian PM
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to his Syrian counterpart Muhammad Nazi Otri Friday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of Syria's independence.
					Expressing belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily develop in all fields, he in the message sincerely wished the Syrian Prime Minister greater success in his and government work to build modern and prosperous Syria.

articles.title: Gift from Mongolian Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Mongolian Delegation
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Mongolian delegation for commemorating the Day of the Sun on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned by D. Michka, general director of the Mongolian HUM Company Ltd. who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked at DPRK Embassy in Beijing, Moscow
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked at DPRK Embassy in Beijing, Moscow
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Beijing hosted a reception on April 14 to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					 Present there on invitation were Sun Jiazheng, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Li Chenqun, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China, Zhang Zhijun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, and other officials concerned of China.
					
					 Ambassador Choe Jin Su and staff members of the DPRK embassy were on hand.
					
					 In his speech at the reception Choe Jin Su wished the Chinese people greater success in their work to build a harmonious socialist society and achieve the reunification of the country under the leadership of the CPC with Hu Jintao as its general-secretary.
					
					 Sun Jiazheng noted with high appreciation that President Kim Il Sung performed immortal exploits, which will remain long in history, by leading the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people for many years, and expressed the will of the Chinese side to strive together with the DPRK side to make sure that the bilateral relations will result in richer fruition.
					
					 Meanwhile, a similar reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on April 13.
					
					 Present there on invitation were personages of government ministries, political parties, organizations and institutions of Russia including Deputy Speaker of the State Duma Zhirinovsky and Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Borodavkin and Yazov, former Soviet Union defence minister.
					
					The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the full-length picture of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and looked round photos displayed on the theme of "President Kim Il Sung and Overseas Compatriots".
					
					 Speaking at the reception Ambassador Kim Yong Jae noted that President Kim Il Sung gave birth to the DPRK-Russia friendship long ago and made immortal contributions for the development of friendly and cooperative relations between the two peoples. And he expressed the will to continue to develop the bilateral relations in the spirit of the DPRK-Russia joint documents this significant year.
					
					 Borodavkin said that Russia and the DPRK have steadily worked to develop the bilateral relations and expand mutual cooperation in various fields on the basis of the treaty of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperation between the two countries signed in 2000 and the agreements reached between their top leaders.
					
					 A performance of the Russian State Academic People's Chorus Named after M. E. Pyatnichki was given at the reception.
					
					 A reception was also given at the DPRK Consulate General in Nakhodka of Russia on the same day.

articles.title: Performances for Guests of Honor Given
articles.content:
Performances for Guests of Honor Given
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Participants in the Second April Spring People's Art Festival gave performances for guests of honor at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater and the Pyongyang Grand Theater on Friday.
					 Appreciating the performances were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, working people in the city of Pyongyang, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here, foreign guests and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Artistes of central and local art troupes put on the stages such colorful numbers as violin solo "We Go to Mangyongdae" and female solo "The Eternal Smile".
					
					 The performers loudly sang of the feats of President Kim Il Sung who turned the DPRK into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, under the banner of the Juche idea and made an immortal contribution to the popular masses' cause of independence.
					
					In male solo "Tell, the Road of Songun" and female trio and chorus "General, Here Is the Forefront" they well represented the greatness of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is translating the President's desire into reality under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Overseas compatriot artistes including the art troupe of Koreans in Japan put on the stage such songs as praising the sun and the homeland.
					
					 The program included such numbers as mixed chorus "Arirang of Prosperity of Chongryon" and female sextet "We Can Do" which reflect the determination of overseas compatriots to dynamically advance along the road of patriotism, sharing the mind and breathing the same breath with the people in the homeland who are faithful to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Field Performances of Spring Art Festival Given
articles.content:
Field Performances of Spring Art Festival Given
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Second April Spring People's Art Festival gave field performances in different parts of Pyongyang on April 15 and 16 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The State Folk Art Troupe and the North Hwanghae Provincial, Nampho City and Kaesong City art troupes staged performances in the plaza of the Party Founding Memorial Tower.
					
					 Put on the stage were female solo "We Always Remember All Sorts of Hardships Undergone by the Leader", male quintet "Thunder over Jong Il Peak", mixed duet "Mt. Jongbang Is Famous Mountain of Love" and female folk solo "When Advancing under His Guidance" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers highly praised the sacred revolutionary career of President Kim Il Sung and the feats of Songun leadership performed by Kim Jong Il who has successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe and the Jagang and South Hwanghae Provincial art troupes gave performances in front of the Pyongyang Grand Theater, stirring up the holiday mood. Among the numbers were female solo "His Smile Is Everlasting", female chorus "Beautiful Hometown" and other songs dedicated to the leader and the country.
					
					 Performances full of optimism and joy were given in the plaza of the Arch of Triumph by artistes of the Cinema and Radio Musical Company and the South Phyongan, North and South Hamgyong Provincial art troupes.
					
					 In the Mangyongdae Fun Fair acrobats of the Pyongyang Circus and local art organizations staged such numbers as physical stunt, comic acrobatics and juggleries.
					
					 Members of the art groups of the February 8 Vinalon Complex, the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the Nyongbyon Silk Mill, the Pyongyang Underground Shop, the Phyonghwa Cooperative Farm in Kaesong City and the Wonha Cooperative Farm in Phyongwon County and the Haphung Coal Mine gave performances in different parts of the city.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Treachery Condemned
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Treachery Condemned
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement on April 13 in which it denounced the puppet authorities for their treachery of blocking the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang, symbolic of national reconciliation and reunification.
					 The statement recalled that some days ago the DPRK took a new step now that there is no way to resume the said tour.
					
					 It charged that the "Grand National Party" and the regime have repeatedly called for "three conditions" over the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang and got more hell-bent on the suppression of the reunification movement, openly advocating the "principle of confrontation with the north" and creating the military tension.
					
					 The authorities are calling for "strong measure" to cope with the "derailed south-north relations" by someone though they brought tremendous damage to the nation, the statement pointed out, adding that it is no more than a disgraceful behavior intended to pervert the essence of the developments.
					
					 Expressing the resolve to do utmost to punish the GNP and the regime without fail and improve the relations between the south and the north and achieve their reconciliation and unity, the statement called upon all the people to give fuller play to the spirit of "By our nation itself" and conduct a more vigorous struggle.

articles.title: Struggle against Group of Traitors Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against Group of Traitors Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- 19 general student councils of south Korea including those of Korea University, Yonsei University, Hanyang University and Pusan University and various university student organizations on April 11 formed a "solidarity of university students voters", declaring that they would stage a vigorous struggle to judge the puppet group with the "elections to local self-governing bodies" as a momentum.
					 A press conference was called at Yonsei University that day as regards the inauguration of the solidarity.
					
					 At the conference the solidarity noted that the issue of registration fee remains unsettled despite the demand of university students and they are afraid of their graduation as the issue of jobless youths is very serious.
					
					 It declared that all the university students would pool their efforts to struggle for the democratic rights with the forthcoming "elections" as an occasion.
					
					 Deceptive "commitments" only for the "elections" are not needed, the organization said, adding that the university students demand realistic measures and proper policy for reducing the registration fee and settling the unemployment problem for the young people, etc.
					
					 It stressed that all the university students would take an active part in the "elections" to certainly judge the present conservative ruling forces and clearly show how strong their strength is.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Highly Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Highly Lauded
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The general-secretary of the Arab Lawyers Union and personages of Poland and Portugal made public statements to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					 Ibrahim Eisam Lary, general-secretary of the Arab Lawyers Union, said in his statement on Apr. 5 that President Kim Il Sung is the great leader of the Korean people and the pioneer of the era of independence.
					
					His undying feats for the Korean revolution and the world revolution have been creditably carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he noted, adding that the exploits the President performed by fully supporting the struggle of peoples in developing countries will remain forever with the cause of independence.
					
					 Miguel Boieir, chairman of the Portugal-Korea Friendship Association, in his statement on Apr. 9 highly praised Kim Il Sung as the great man who founded the Juche idea and wisely led the Korean people and the world progressives to the accomplishment of the cause of socialism and global independence.
					
					 The statement stressed that the Korean people are sure to emerge victorious in the efforts to ensure peace in the Korean Peninsula and achieve the national reunification under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A member of the National Executive Committee of the Polish Communist Party said in a statement on April 5 that thanks to the wise policy of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Kim Jong Il the Korean people would surely build an economic power in Korea, full of optimism and confidence in victory, which will shine over the world.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated in Japan
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated in Japan
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Tokyo of Japan on April 9 to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					 It was attended by personages of various organizations, including the Japanese Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung, the Japanese Women's Society for Solidarity with the Korean Women, the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the Saitama Prefectural Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity, the Japan-Korea Cultural Interchange Association and the Central Headquarters of the Japanese Side of the Fact-Finding Group for the Probe into the Truth about the Forcible Drafting of Koreans, and popular masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were officials of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 The participants of the meeting watched a video dealing with the revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung in the period of the building of a new country and the postwar rehabilitation and construction.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The representative of the Japanese Women's Society for Solidarity with the Korean Women who is chairperson the Japanese Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung said that during her visit to the DPRK she was deeply moved to see all the Korean people exerting their inexhaustible efforts to building their country in single-minded unity. It was a striking reality of the DPRK in which the people have pushed ahead with socialist construction in the spirit of self-reliance by applying the Juche idea fathered by the President, she added.
					
					The representative member of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the deputy chief director of the Japan-Korea Cultural Interchange Association and the co-representative of the Central Headquarters of the Japanese Side of the Fact-Finding Group for the Probe into the Truth about the Forcible Drafting of Koreans called for widely introducing the feats of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has developed in depth the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung while standing in the van of the struggle for independence and peace. And they expressed the will to strive for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and the improvement of the DPRK-Japan relations.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Peru
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Peru
						
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism issued a bulletin on April 6 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 In an article titled "Vitality of the Juche Idea of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" the bulletin introduced in detail the originality and advantages of the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and said it is fruition of the independent politics based on the Juche idea that the DPRK has reliably defended and further developed socialism.
					
					 Noting that the vitality of the Juche idea has been clearly demonstrated in the DPRK, the bulletin stressed that the DPRK advancing under the banner of the Juche idea is sure to emerge victorious despite the U.S. ceaseless threat and provocation to it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita al presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita al presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 16 un mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad, secretario regional del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe (BAAS) y presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria con motivo del aniversario 64 de la Independencia de Siria.
					La misiva senala:
					
					Hago llegar a Usted y al amistoso pueblo de vuestro pais mis calurosas felicitaciones en ocasion del aniversario 64 de la independencia de Siria, fiesta nacional del pueblo sirio.
					
					Nuestro pueblo se regocija de todo corazon de que despues de la independencia, el pueblo sirio ha alcanzado un gran avance en el cumplimiento de la causa justa por defender la soberania del pais y la dignidad nacional y construir Siria moderna, rechazando los desafios de toda indole de las fuerzas hostiles. 
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para desear con toda sinceridad al pueblo sirio siempre exitos en sus esfuerzos por lograr la prosperidad del pais y solucionar de manera imparcial y comprensiva el problema del Medio Oriente, y a Usted, buena salud y felicidad.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam y Kim Yong Il envian telegrama a sus homologos chinos
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam y Kim Yong Il envian telegrama a sus homologos chinos
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam, y el premier del Consejo de Ministros Kim Yong Il, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, enviaron el dia 15 un telegrama de consuelo al presidente Hu Jintao y el primer ministro del Consejo de Estado Wen Jiabao, de la Republica Popular China, en relacion con que este pais sufrio muchas perdidas humanas y materiales por el terremoto ocurrido en la provincia de Qinghai.
					Los remitentes expresan profunda simpatia y consuelo a los destinatarios y, por su conducto, al gobierno y pueblo de China, a las victimas y sus familiares, y desean de todo corazon que bajo la direccion del Partido Comunista de China y el gobierno chino, los habitantes de la zona damnificada eliminen cuanto antes las consecuencias del desastre y recuperen la vida estabilizada.

articles.title: Banquetes por Dia del Sol en embajadas coreanas en China y Rusia
articles.content:
Banquetes por Dia del Sol en embajadas coreanas en China y Rusia
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol (15 de abril-cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung), la embajada de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la Republica Popular China ofrecio el dia 14 un banquete.
					A la ocasion fueron invitados el vicepresidente del Comite Nacional de la Conferencia Consultiva Politica del Pueblo Chino Sun Jiazheng, el subjefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Li Chenqun, el vicecanciller Zhang Zhijun, el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad China-Corea Wu Donghe y otros funcionarios interesados.
					
					Ademas, participaron el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario Choe Jin su y los miembros de la embajada coreana en China.
					
					El embajador coreano, al hacer uso de la palabra deseo al pueblo chino mayores exitos en su labor por la construccion de una sociedad socialista armoniosa y la unificacion del pais bajo la direccion del PCCh encabezado por el secretario general Hu Jintao. 
					
					El vicepresidente del Comite Nacional de la CCPPCh elogio al gran Lider camarada Kim Il Sung quien al conducir el Partido del Trabajo y el pueblo de Corea durante largo tiempo, alcanzo las imborrables hazanas que brillaran eternamente en la historia y expreso su determinacion de hacer esfuerzos junto con la parte coreana por impulsar las relaciones entre China y Corea para que estas den un gran fruto.
					
					Y la embajada de la RPDC en la Federacion Rusa ofrecio el dia 13 un banquete donde participaron el vicepresidente de la Duma Estatal de Rusia, Zhirinovsky, el viceministro de RR.EE., Borodapkin, las personalidades de los ministerios del gobierno, partidos politicos, entidades y organos y el ex ministro de Defensa de la URSS, Yajov.
					
					Los participantes depositaron cesto y ramos de flores ante el retrato del cuerpo completo del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, estando juntos, y recorrieron las fotos exhibidas bajo el tema del "Presidente Kim Il Sung y los coreanos en ultramar".
					
					Kim Yong Jae, en su discurso pronunciado en el banquete, recordo que el Presidente dio inicio temprano a la amistad Corea-Rusia e hizo inmortal contribucion al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos pueblos y expreso su determinacion de seguir desarrollando en este ano significativo los vinculos bilaterales conforme al espiritu de los documentos comunes Corea-Rusia.
					
					Borodapkin se refirio a que Rusia y Corea se esfuerzan invariablemente para fortalecer y desarrollar las relaciones bilaterales en diversos dominios y ampliar la cooperacion mutua a base del tratado sobre la amistad, buena vecindad y cooperacion rubricado en 2000 y el acuerdo firmado entre los maximos Dirigentes de los dos paises.
					
					En el banquete, hubo la funcion del Coro Folclorico Academico Nacional M. E. Pyatnichki de Rusia.
					
					El mismo dia, tambien en el consulado general de la RPDC en Nahodka de Rusia se ofrecio un banquete.

articles.title: Funciones por invitacion del festival artistico nacional de abri
articles.content:
Funciones por invitacion del festival artistico nacional de abri
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 15 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo, la Casa Cultural del Ministerio del Ferrocarril y el teatro musical del Conservatorio Kim Won Gyun de Pyongyang las funciones por invitacion del II Festival Artistico Nacional de Abril en Primavera.
					Las disfrutaron los cuadros del partido, ejercito y el Estado, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios de organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, militares del ejercito popular y trabajadores de esta ciudad.
					
					Los participantes en las funciones conjuntas del Festival Nacional de Grupos de Propaganda Artistica, de Grupos de Agitacion Artistica Movil y del Festival Artistico Nacional de Trabajadores, pusieron en escenas variadas piezas.
					
					En el coro "!Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung!", la poesia y coro "Cancion de la Fidelidad" (obra clasica), etc. los ejecutantes elogiaron los grandes rasgos del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Tambien, describieron en varias piezas las hazanas de direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien forjo una nueva historia de la causa de la eternidad del lider y hace brillar la dignidad y el honor de la patria de Kim Il Sung enarbolando la bandera del Songun.
					
					Ademas, hubo las piezas que estimulan a todo el ejercito y el pueblo a la creacion y proezas.

articles.title: Continuan funciones por invitacion del festival artistico de abril
articles.content:
Continuan funciones por invitacion del festival artistico de abril
						
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 16 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este y en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang las funciones por invitacion del II Festival Artistico Nacional de Abril en Primavera.
					Las disfrutaron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, militares del ejercito popular, trabajadores capitalinos, representantes diplomaticos y delegados de las organizaciones internacionales acreditados en Corea, huespedes extranjeros y coreanos en ultramar.
					
					Los artistas de los conjuntos artisticos centrales y locales pusieron en la escena el solo de violin "Visitando Mangyongdae", el solo femenino "Eterna sonrisa del Presidente y otras varias piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes elogiaron altamente las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien convirtio nuestra patria en una potencia socialista de la independencia, el autososten y la autodefensa con la bandera de la idea Juche en alto e hizo gran contribucion al cumplimiento de la causa de las masas populares por la independencia.
					
					Describieron magnificamente la grandeza del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien bajo la bandera del Songun (priorizacion militar) realiza el anhelo de toda la vida del Presidente a traves de varias piezas entre otras el solo masculino "Cuentalo, el camino del Songun" y el trio femenino "El carro de campana corre el largo camino hacia el frente".
					
					Los artistas del Conjunto Artistico de Coreanos en Japon y otras entidades artisticas de los coreanos en ultramar adornaron especificamente las escenas con las canciones que elogian al Presidente y la patria.
					
					En las escenas se pusieron tambien el coro mixto "Arirang de prosperidad de la Chongryon", el sexteto femenino "Podemos hacerlo", etc. que muestran la decision de los compatriotas en ultramar de compartir el alma con el pueblo de la patria que sostiene con fidelidad la direccion del Dirigente y de marchar con vigor por el camino de patriotismo.
